reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Strengthening the capacity of the Supreme People's Court of Vietnam in handling foreign commercial cases and requests

description.narrative: The project is designed to strengthen skills in handling foreign commercial disputes and requests on enforcement of foreign court judgments and arbitral awards. It will provide training courses on international experiences and national provisions and dissemination of court precedents on international commercial disputes. Supporting the improved quality of resolutions on foreign commercial disputes and creating favourable conditions for foreign business communities (including UK business).

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
